statements: SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 1000;
SELECT influencer_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns WHERE test_group = 'control';
SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, influencer_id, campaign_name, campaign_budget FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns WHERE test_group = 'Control' AND (campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30');
SELECT DISTINCT influencer_id, MAX(campaign_budget) AS max_budget FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns GROUP BY influencer_id HAVING max_budget >= 10000 ORDER BY max_budget DESC;

SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2021-10-01' AND test_group != 'Exclude' ORDER BY campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name FROM influencer_campaigns;
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM influencer_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE influencer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM influencer_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC, campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM influencer_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns FROM influencer_campaigns;

SELECT influencer_name, campaign_name, clicks, conversions FROM influencer_campaigns JOIN ab_test_results ON influencer_campaigns.id = ab_test_results.campaign_id WHERE ab_test_results.clicks > 100 AND ab_test_results.conversions > 10 ORDER BY conversions DESC, clicks ASC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT experiment_id, group_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM ExperimentResults WHERE metric_value < 0.05;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentResults WHERE metric_name = 'click_through_rate' AND metric_value > 0.1;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencer WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM ab_test;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_metric, result_value FROM test_results WHERE result_value > 0.5;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencer;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM ab_test WHERE LENGTH(test_description) > 50;
SELECT campaign_id, variation_name, result_value FROM test_results WHERE result_metric = 'click_through_rate';
SELECT test_name, results_id FROM ab_test JOIN test_results ON ab_test.test_id = test_results.test_id;
SELECT * FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_category FROM influencer WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT test_name, test_description FROM a_b_testing WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT influencer_id, SUM(reach) AS total_reach FROM engagement_metrics GROUP BY influencer_id ORDER BY total_reach DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, influencer_category FROM influencer WHERE influencer_category = 'Fashion' LIMIT 5;
SELECT engagement_rate, reach, conversions FROM engagement_metrics WHERE campaign_id = 2 AND influencer_id = 5;
SELECT test_id, test_name, test_description FROM a_b_testing WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
